project.name: Airbnb Planner Multi-Agent Example
project.description:
Comprehensive Spring AI A2A example demonstrating TWO orchestration patterns:
Pattern 1: LLM-Driven Orchestration (travel-planner-agent) - LLM autonomously decides when to call agents - A2A Remote Agents (HTTP/A2A protocol) - accommodation-agent - MCP Tools (stdio protocol) - weather tools - Uses A2AToolCallback for remote agent integration
Pattern 2: Programmatic Orchestration (direct-sdk-planner) - Developer controls exactly when each agent is called - Direct A2A Java SDK usage without ToolCallback wrapper - Sequential coordination with explicit control flow - No LLM orchestration costs
Agents: - travel-planner-agent: LLM-driven orchestrator (port 8080) - accommodation-agent: A2A remote agent (port 10002) - weather-agent: A2A remote agent (port 10001) - direct-sdk-planner: Programmatic orchestrator (port 8081)
